name: Furies: Last Escape
storyline: It’s been 3 years since Zgirls built bases against zombies. Zgirls has mastered a vast amount of advanced military technologies. However, terrorists controlled upgraded zombies and invaded Zgirls bases. The bases got compromised while they were under loose defense. Now, you commanders will lead Zgirls fight with decisive organizations. Build your own military empire, conduct all kinds of army, and rebuild the world order until to be the new leader!
